note:
I am a father of 2
23 years old
A proud Gemini

I go by Niiko-Niiko. A writer and poet when it come to my soul and thoughts. I want to run my Mastodon server like a personal wall in the New York City Subway System. I will be writing poems and telling stories that i find significant to whats going on with me at this time. You guys, the audience, will be exposed to a side of me that i haven't been comfortable sharing until now. I will write about my life, things in general and even world events.
